info.name: Match.com Crap Blocker
info.description: Removes a bunch of the crap that Match adds to their site.
info.additionalInfo:
v1.1.1: Fixed Top Spot image
v1.1: Added "Profile Power Ups" and extended "Power Up images"
v1.0: Blocks the POWER UP button, the Chat window, the Stir/Events bar and the Top Spot image
